en.searchWhat: What would you like to search?
en.startMsg: Move a green piece to the board and enter a keyword to start your search.
en.notLineErr: You cannot place an OR on the same line after a NOT.
en.onlyGrnErr: You can only attach those pieces to the word/phrase green piece.
en.onlyGrnOrPrplErr: You can only attach those pieces to the word/phrase green piece or url purple piece.
en.noUrlToNotAndErr: You cannot attach url pieces to not pieces or and pieces.
en.noUrlToOrBlankErr: You cannot attach a url piece to an or piece that is attached to a word/phrase piece.
en.tooManyCharsErr: You cannot enter more than 76 characters.
en.sameKeywordsErr: You can't search for the same thing twice.
en.noSearchToSaveErr: You haven't searched for anything yet.
en.completeSearchErr: You can't save a search until it has completed.
en.noResultsToSaveErr: You can't save a search without any results.
en.tooLongHorizErr: You cannot add any more horizontal pieces.
en.blankNotification: Drag and drop a green word / phrase to begin searching. Results appear below.
en.wordOrPhraseNotification: Enter a single word or a phrase that you want to include in your results
en.exactWordOrPhraseNotification: Enter a single word or phrase that you want to find exactly
en.synonymNotification: Enter a word with synonyms that you want to find
en.urlNotification: Enter a URL that results should appear within.
en.notNotification: Not removes results from your search.

es.startMsg: Para empezar la búsqueda coloque una pieza verde en el tablero. Refine su busqueda con otras piezas, por ejemplo: Y, O, SIN, o URL.
es.notLineErr: No puedes colocar un Y en la misma línea que un SIN.
es.onlyGrnErr: Solo puedes conectar esas piezas a la palabra o frase en la pieza verde.
es.onlyGrnOrPrplErr: Solo puedes conectar esas piezas a la pieza verde (palabra o frase) o a la pieza morada (URL).
es.noUrlToNotAndErr: No puedes conectar una pieza morada (URL) a una pieza roja (SIN) o una pieza azul (AND).
es.noUrlToOrBlankErr: No puedes conectar una pieza morada (URL) una pieza azul (Y) que está conectada a una pieza verde (palabra o frase)
es.tooManyCharsErr: No puedes teclear más de 76 caracteres.
es.sameKeywordsErr: No puedes usar las misma palabras dos veces.
es.completeSearchErr: No puedes guardar tu búsqueda hasta que la hayas completado.
es.noResultsToSaveErr: No puedes guardar una búsqueda si no tienes resultados.
es.tooLongHorizErr: No puedes agregar más piezas horizontales.
es.blankNotification: Spanish To begin your search, move a green keyword piece to the board. Refine your search by adding pieces, such as not, or, or a URL to limit your results. Results appear below.
es.wordOrPhraseNotification: Spanish Enter a single word or a phrase that you want to include in your results
es.exactWordOrPhraseNotification: Spanish Enter a single word or phrase that you want to find exactly
es.synonymNotification: Spanish Enter a word with synonyms that you want to find
es.urlNotification: Spanish Enter a URL, in the format http://www.site.com that you want to contrain your searches to

sv.searchWhat: What would you like to search?
sv.startMsg: För att påbörja din sökning, flyttar du en grön nyckelordsbit. Du begränsar din sökning genom att lägga till fler bitar, som till exempel inte, eller, eller en URL.
sv.notLineErr: Du kan inte placera ELLER på samma rad efter INTE.
sv.onlyGrnErr: Du kan bara sätta ihop dessa bitar med den gröna ord/fras-biten.
sv.onlyGrnOrPrplErr: Du kan bara sätta ihop dessa bitar med den gröna ord/fras-biten eller den lila URL-biten.
sv.noUrlToNotAndErr: Du kan inte lägga URL-bitar till INTE-bitar eller OCH-bitar.
sv.noUrlToOrBlankErr: Du kan inte lägga en URL-bit till en ELLER-bit som sitter ihop med ord/fras-bit.
sv.tooManyCharsErr: Du får inte använda mer är 76 tecken.
sv.noSearchToSaveErr: Du har inte sökt efter något ännu.
sv.completeSearchErr: Du kan inte spara en sökning innan den är färdig.
sv.noResultsToSaveErr: Du kan inte spara en sökning som inte givit något resultat.
sv.tooLongHorizErr: Du kan inte lägga till fler horisontella bitar.

pt.searchWhat: O que voce gostaria de buscar?
pt.startMsg: Para comecar a sua busca, coloque palavra chave verde no quadro grande. Para refinar sua busca, adicione as outras pecas, como, por exemplo, Nao, Ou, ou a URL para limitar sua busca.
pt.notLineErr: Voce nao pode usar OU na mesma linha depois de NAO
pt.onlyGrnErr: Voce pode apenas anexar as pecas as palavras/frase peca verde.
pt.onlyGrnOrPrplErr: Voce pode apenas anexar essas pecas as palavras/frase peca verde ou a peca roxa da URL.
pt.noUrlToNotAndErr: Voce nao pode anexar as pecas da URL as pecas de NAO ou E.
pt.noUrlToOrBlankErr: Voce nao pode anexar as pecas da URL a uma peca de OU que esteja anexada a uma peca de palavra/frase
pt.tooManyCharsErr: Voce nao pode digitar mais de 76 caracteres.
pt.noSearchToSaveErr: Voce nao procurou por nada ainda!
pt.completeSearchErr: Voce nao pode salvar uma busca ate que ela seja completada.
pt.noResultsToSaveErr: Voce nao pode salvar uma busca sem resultados.
pt.tooLongHorizErr: Voce nao pode adicionar mais pecas na horizontal.
